summary: This document is an email correspondence from the FBI's eFOIA system acknowledging receipt of a FOIA request. The requester seeks records related to Jeffrey Epstein from 2006-2010, including evidence, communications, and any documents that might show interference in his investigation or prosecution. The requester argues for expedited processing and a fee waiver based on the significant public interest in the case.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The FOIA request seeks all records related to him, specifically from 2006 to 2010, including evidence, communications, and investigative materials.

events.title: Period of requested Epstein records
events.description: The FOIA requester seeks records related to Jeffrey Epstein from roughly 2006 to 2010.

events.title: FOIA Request Submission
events.description: An individual submits a FOIA request to the FBI for records on Jeffrey Epstein, requesting expedited processing and a fee waiver.

keyFacts: A FOIA request was submitted to the FBI seeking all records related to Jeffrey Epstein from approximately 2006 to 2010.
The requested records include communications, evidence (photos/videos), and any instructions that may have hindered the investigation or prosecution of Epstein.
The requester argues for expedited processing and a fee waiver, citing significant public interest and media attention regarding the government's handling of the Epstein case.
The document is an automated acknowledgment from the FBI's eFOIA system, indicating the request is pending and will be processed in order.
